name: Unliving in the Moment
description:
You're a ghost who can only be a ghost at moments in time.

Made by:

  • Michael Gray(MichaelGDev48) (Programmer)
  • Dion Tryban  (Trikzon) (Programmer)
  • Kelvin (Kelvin285) (Programmer and Artist)

Made using Godot Engine. 

If you run into any issues running the Mac build please contact DarthM#0389 or 

Trikzon#7166 on discord

Source code: https://github.com/MichaelGDev48/usf-gamejam22-momentary-game
